content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) that smelts iron ore into iron plates; loaded with 48 units of iron ore and currently reporting status NO_FUEL.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) that smelts copper ore into copper plates; holds fuel {coal: 2}, has produced 6 copper plates with energy 1600.0, and status NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {automation-science-pack: 10} and status NO_POWER.
- ElectricityGroup with id=13136 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with warnings “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, and “no fluid present in connections” (status NOT_CONNECTED).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box containing ~199.97 units of water at 15°C; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel”; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); updated fluid_system [49300].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box containing ~99.87 units of water at 15°C; status WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); updated fluid_system [49300].
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
  • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=49300, status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=49301, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=49302, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=49307, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=49306, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=49311, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=49310, status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=49313, status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Identifier Inconsistency:
  • Repeated pipeline connection attempts using working PipeGroup with fluid_system values 48956, 48999, 49042, 49085, 49128, 49171, 49214, and 49257 have all failed with “No working PipeGroup found.”
  • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and validate active fluid_system identifiers from the pipeline network so that the boiler output is connected to a matching, working PipeGroup.

- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
  • The reliance on preset fluid_system values has led to multiple pipeline connection failures.
  • Tip: Determine and use the correct fluid_system identifier at runtime to ensure compatibility between the boiler output and the available PipeGroup.

- Fuel Supply Oversight:
  • The boiler remains without fuel, which impedes effective steam generation.
  • Tip: Monitor the fuel levels and replenish fuel promptly to maintain boiler operation.
